mapper.select: SELECT SCENE_CD ,SCENE_NM FROM SCENE_GAME SG #where SCENE_CD NOT IN ('S001','S002','S003') ORDER BY SCENE_CD
SELECT EVENT_CD ,CAST(EVENT_SEQ AS CHAR) EVENT_SEQ ,E_TYPE FROM EVENT_SCENE ES WHERE SCENE_CD = #{SCENE_CD} ORDER BY EVENT_CD, EVENT_SEQ
SELECT SCRIPT_CD ,CAST(SCRIPT_SEQ AS CHAR) SCRIPT_SEQ ,SCRIPT_TXT FROM SCRIPT_EVENT SE WHERE EVENT_CD = #{EVENT_CD} AND EVENT_SEQ = #{EVENT_SEQ} ORDER BY SCRIPT_SEQ

SELECT SP.SELECT_CD ,SP.S_TYPE ,SP.SELECT_HEAD ,CAST(SP.NUM_OF_SELECT AS CHAR) NUM_OF_SELECT ,CAST(OS.OPTION_SEQ AS CHAR) OPTION_SEQ ,OS.OPTION_TXT ,OS.RESULT_OCCURRED FROM SELECT_PLAY SP JOIN OPTION_SELECT OS ON SP.SELECT_CD = OS.SELECT_CD WHERE SP.PLAY_CD = #{PLAY_CD}
SELECT CAST(OPTION_SEQ AS CHAR) OPTION_SEQ ,OPTION_TXT ,RESULT_OCCURRED FROM OPTION_SELECT OS WHERE SELECT_CD = #{SELECT_CD} ORDER BY OPTION_SEQ

SELECT BP.BATTLE_CD ,BP.MAP_CD ,BP.NEXT_EVENT_CD ,BP.NEXT_EVENT_SEQ ,SP.PLAY_CD ,SP.SELECT_ALIAS ,SP.SELECT_CD FROM BATTLE_PLAY BP JOIN SELECT_PLAY SP ON SP.SELECT_CD IN (BP.SELECT1,BP.SELECT2,BP.SELECT3,BP.SELECT4) WHERE BP.PLAY_CD = #{PLAY_CD}
SELECT JH_CD ,RESULT_TXT ,RESULT_OCCURRED FROM JUSTHPN_EVENT JE WHERE EVENT_CD = #{EVENT_CD} AND EVENT_SEQ = #{EVENT_SEQ}
SELECT INPUT_CD ,INPUT_PLACEHOLDER ,RESULT_TXT ,RESULT_OCCURRED FROM INPUT_PLAY IP WHERE PLAY_CD = #{PLAY_CD}

SELECT BRANCH_CD , BRANCH_METHOD , Y_EVENT_CD , Y_EVENT_SEQ , N_EVENT_CD , N_EVENT_SEQ , OUT_EVENT_CD , OUT_EVENT_SEQ FROM BRANCH_EVENT WHERE 1=1 AND EVENT_CD = #{EVENT_CD} AND EVENT_SEQ = #{EVENT_SEQ}
